Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: horizontalOffset

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: flipUpsideDown

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: isCurved
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: Is text curved or not, works only with orientation equal to horizontal, default value is true

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: lineBreakMode
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: The technique to use for wrapping and truncating the label’s text, default value is .clip

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: numberOfLines
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: The maximum number of lines to use for rendering text., default valie is 1

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: alignment
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: The technique to use for aligning the text, default value is .left
